name: The Super Pie Throwing
summary:
Princess Rosa is mad…. And her maids are gonna pay!!! After a tragic dessert mishap, everything falls apart.

The Super Pie Throwing is a slapstick action mini game where you throw pies, avoid weights, play red light green light, and all other sorts of things to earn HUGE POINTS!!! Try challenge mode for a variety of challenges and obstacles that change the core gameplay and push your skills! Or, if you want to just jump in for a quick match, try Time Attack and Score Attack!

30 unique challenges, various unlockables, funny faces, and more!!!
